alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 5:46PM EDT until August 07 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lancaster County in central South Carolina... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 546 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Harrisburg to near Hickory Grove, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Indian Land, Elgin, Andrew Jackson State Park, USC Lancaster, Van Wyck, Irwin, Buford, Arrowood Estates, Bell Town Fire Station, Camp Creek Fire Station, Community of Almond Glen, Faith Christian School, Unity Fire Station, Lancaster Mill, Carolina Commons Shopping Center, McWhirter Airfield, and McDonald Green Elementary School. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
